project.description: count how many Patchsets and merges happened between two dates.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#check if the project is in gerrit or in test-gerrit if [[ "$PROJECT_NAME" == "TP/GWApp" || "$PROJECT_NAME" == "EMS/ovoc_server" ]] then SERVER=shukyr@test-gerrit else SERVER=shukyr@gerrit fi PORT=29418
# Get Today's date TodayDate=$(date +"%Y%m%d") # Get dates entered in date format beforeDate=$(date -d $BEFORE_DATE +"%Y%m%d") afterDate=$(date -d $AFTER_DATE +"%Y%m%d")
# check if entered Wrong Date if [ $afterDate -ge $beforeDate ] then echo "******************************************************************" echo "WRONG DATE ENTERED AFTER_DATE need to be smaller then BEFORE_DATE" echo "******************************************************************" exit 1 fi
if [ $beforeDate -ge $TodayDate ] then echo "*************************************************" echo "WRONG DATE! BEFORE_DATE need to be smaller then Today's Date" echo "*************************************************" exit 1 fi set +x #get all the details about all the patchsets that created jsonFile=$(ssh -p $PORT $SERVER gerrit query --format=JSON project:$PROJECT_NAME before:$BEFORE_DATE after:$AFTER_DATE --patch-sets) patchSetArray=( $(echo "$jsonFile" | jq '.patchSets | length') )
#get all the details about all the merges jsonFileMerged=$(ssh -p $PORT $SERVER gerrit query --format=JSON status:Merged project:$PROJECT_NAME before:$BEFORE_DATE after:$AFTER_DATE) MergedArray=( $(echo "$jsonFileMerged" | jq '.rowCount | length') ) set -x #print how many times patchset and merges happend printf '%s\n' "${patchSetArray[@]}" |awk '{sum+=$1};END{print "the amount of PatchSets to the project is " sum}' echo "The amount of Issues that merged to the project $PROJECT_NAME between $BEFORE_DATE to $AFTER_DATE is ${MergedArray[-1]}"
